author: _shemnon
content: <@1011612262743679036> - for adding the immediate argument to the standard trace, how do we want to handle RJUMPV?  Use the actual resolved offset (or empty string for out of bounds)?  That seems better than the entire jump table.

author: _shemnon
content: Corollary, for RJUMPI always have the relative jump target regardless of the jump test?  Or only when the jump is taken?  (empty string for failed test)
